Name: Colt M4A1 5.56x45 Carbine MOD3
Description: The Colt M4A1 is a carbine rifle designed by the United States based on the AR-15 platform, using 5.56x45 NATO ammunition. This is the third modification using a four-star rifle modification template, focusing on reducing recoil, improving stability during shooting, enhancing human-machine efficiency, and quadrupling the maintenance cost.
